task_lists.title: Daily Tasks
description: Check emails and respond to urgent messages.
Review and update task list for the day.
Attend morning stand-up meeting with the team.

task_lists.title: Project Milestones
description: Prepare project status report for stakeholders.
Discuss upcoming milestones with the project manager.

task_lists.title: Marketing Campaign
description: Finalize content for social media posts.
Review and approve design concepts for ads.
Schedule launch of the campaign on all platforms.
